ingredients.ingredient: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of chicken soup
2 (10 ounce) packages refrigerated biscuit dough, torn into pieces

cookingTips: Add biscuit dough pieces in the last 30-45 minutes on high so they don't become mushy
Tear biscuits into smaller pieces for more dumplings throughout the dish
Keep the lid closed while dumplings cook to trap steam
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Timing is critical with biscuit dumplings in a slow cooker. Have you made this dish before?
